verses.name: 1 Corinthians 15:19
verses.text: If in this life only we have hope in Christ, we are of all men most miserable.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 15:20
verses.text: But now is Christ risen from the dead, and become the firstfruits of them that slept.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 15:21
verses.text: For since by man came death, by man came also the resurrection of the dead.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 15:22
verses.text: For as in Adam all die, even so in Christ shall all be made alive.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 15:23
verses.text: But every man in his own order: Christ the firstfruits; afterward they that are Christ’s at his coming.
